des:
Currently available in English, Spanish, French and Italian

Mother Tongue gets you speaking another language. Using AI, this innovative skill serves as your personal language tutor, available 24/7 reducing the need for expensive tutors and fitting seamlessly into your schedule. 

For best results, set your Alexa Device's language to match that of the language you want to practise. It's simple to do and for help please refer to our website for more information. 

With Mother Tongue, you can:

- Practice any language by selecting your preferred language, time, and conversation topic.
- Unlock premium content by subscribing for extended sessions and access to a broader range of topics.
- Cancel your subscription at any time or stop the conversation flow easily with simple commands.
- Get help with specific queries using the 'Help' feature, which guides you through the skill's options.
- Restart your session by launching the skill anew to explore new conversation topics and practice sessions.

Disclaimer: This skill offers premium content for purchase, which provides extended sessions and access to additional topics. Subscribing unlocks more features, but no pricing information is provided here. Content in this skill may be in a language different from the one set on your Alexa account.

To understand more about Mother Tongue, how to maximize your learning experience, and quickly change the Alexa language, please visit our website: https://www.mother-tongue.co.
